channel.title: Editing Shops? (No shops.cfg file) :|
channel.description:
I'm trying to edit the shops in my server, but I don't have a shops.cfg file
I've looked everywhere, and haven't found anything similar to shops.cfg
So, how do I edit shops? (I'm using PkPlanet source)

item.title: Editing Shops? (No shops.cfg file) :|
item.dc:creator: @lurtz1230 lurtz1230
item.description:
@lurtz1230 wrote:

Im using pk planet source and i have a shops.cfg Mine is located in the config folder in source, dont know what happened to yours. If ur really stuck figure out one or 2 items in one of the shops then keep looking for em in client.java or somewhere.

Read full topic
